news.content:
ðŸ“¦ Titan Delivery Update & Reminder


Global Titan shipping is ongoing in all regions!


If you ordered a Titan but have not yet received it, it could be that we are missing information from you. Please make sure you have created your V3 farm to ensure quick delivery.


https://forum.threefold.io/t/creating-your-v3-farm-required-for-open-unshipped-orders/2144


Our support team is available via threefold.io or on the ThreeFold Connect app with any questions.


If you are an existing farmer and still need to upgrade to V3, please do so asap.
news.excerpt: Global Titan shipping is ongoing in all regions, but we're still waiting on information from some of you!

previous.title: Titan v2.1 Shipping Update
previous.excerpt: We began shipping Titans to Europe last week, but we still need information from many farmers.
